```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r setUp}

url <-  'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/emi90/icecream/main/lasso.csv'
df <- read.csv(url)
```

```{r loadData}

exclude_col = c("Unnamed..0","X", "ingredients.1", "Flavor", "brand", "key", "author", 
                "date", "stars", "title", "helpful_yes", "helpful_no", "text",
                "taste", "ingredients", "texture", "likes", "name")

df_select = select(df, -all_of(exclude_col))

```



```{r logRegression}

mod = glm(is_5 ~ ., data = df_select, family = binomial)
summary(mod)
```


```{r plot}

to_select = summary(mod)$coeff[-1,4] < 0.05
relevant_x = names(to_select)[to_select == TRUE]

```
